title: Spiced blackberry and apple jam
ingredients: ['1kg of blackberries', '750g green apples (cooking, about 6 peeled & cored)', '1.5kg caster sugar', '125ml water', '1 to 2 teaspoons of cinnamon', '1/2 to 1 teaspoon of nutmeg', 'Equipment', "biggest saucepan you've got (30cm across)", '10-12 jars']
